name: Z Runaway
description: A simple and fun arcade. Get on the mad speed in the van, get the money on the road! And try not to break up and lose everything you've been able to gain from your long life at the warm, sunny shore of the sea.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Core2Duo or better Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better Storage: 300 MB available space
